title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the bacon or pancetta until crispy, then set aside.
Beat the eggs in a bowl, add grated Parmesan, and mix well.
Drain the pasta and quickly mix with the bacon and egg-cheese mixture.
Serve immediately with extra black pepper and Parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through, then set aside.
In a pan, melt butter and saut√© the onion until soft.
Add canned tomatoes and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add cream, season, and stir in the cooked chicken.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with ripe avocado, olive oil, and a pinch of salt & pepper.
ingredients: Optional: cherry tomatoes, chili flakes, or feta cheese
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Drizzle with olive oil and add optional toppings.
